topic.title: Custom favicon.ico can't display when use browser proxy to access zeronet
topic.body:
When use http://zero/xxxx in address bar to access zeronet with setting a proxy in browser (like http proxy 127.0.0.1:43110), all zerosites with a custom favicon.ico would not show on the title bar,  it only display the zeronet default favicon.
like this:
![1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/18359157/22623754/4f275dee-eba0-11e6-9255-457e20312479.jpg)
![22](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/18359157/22623771/23e1d0b4-eba1-11e6-8809-25a98691f7e3.jpg)


Use full url (http://127.0.0.1:43110/me.zeronetwork.bit) is work well:
![2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/18359157/22623756/683f17ae-eba0-11e6-9875-d7d71c75dc0a.jpg)

Use bit domain directly (with setting proxy) also work well:
![3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/18359157/22623772/34cb599a-eba1-11e6-88db-ff5b3dbe79c5.jpg)

topic.title: Add mutil thread support for downloading
topic.body:
Now Zeronet is single thread for downloading. So the speed of files loading is slow and unstable, espcially ZeroMux.
So if it can download a files from mutil peers at the same time, it will be more stable and faster.

1604066089_mirrored_AnimeAnimeAnimeAnime.body:
I also have this problem in ZeroNet 0.6.0 with nginx 1.4.7, with https connection.
I enabled mutiluser plugin and uipassword.
